rpgseries: VEL - Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventures
211501.name: Whither Shandalanar?
211501.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

There are many questions about Shandalanar's past, but the character's decisions and actions in this adventure will determine the answer to the question of Shandalanar's future, and perhaps much more.

A Veluna regional adventure for character levels 1 to 14.

211502.name: OrgasMe! Bonus Cards
211502.description: A set of 30 additional cards for OrgasMe! This expansion is exclusive to backers of the Kickstarter project.

rpgseries: VEL - Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventures
211503.name: Beneath the Rock
211503.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Natural disasters have a way of undermining the most careful of preparations. Thus, despite extensive planning, a sudden earthquake has left members of the dwarven Clan Rockhammer trapped in their own mines in the Lortmils. Which brave souls will don helmet and pickax on this mission to extract the excavators?

An underground Veluna regional adventure for [character levels] 2 - 12.

rpgseries: VEL - Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventures
211504.name: Idle Hands
211504.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Helping a lady in distress. Escorting travelers. Delivering a package. All parts of many adventures, but can they be an adventure unto themselves?

Either a very simple or a very complex one-round Regional adventure set in the Archclericy of Veluna for characters level 1 - 10.

Parties that include PCs subject to "Enmity of the Nobility" (from VEL6-08: Heart's Lament) will not be able to experience this entire adventure.

rpgseries: VEL - Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventures
211505.name: Unlamented
211505.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A research expedition to the temple where “Heart’s Lament” was rediscovered has gone missing. The Museum of Mitrik, the College of the Arcane, and House Mori are looking for a few heroic and knowledgeable adventures who are large of heart (but not of size) to find the expedition members and see if there is more to this seemingly simple shrine.

A Veluna regional adventure for character levels 4 to 15.

This is a loose sequel to VEL6-08: Heart's Lament that is not terribly centaur-friendly.

Players that have not played VEL6-08: Heart's Lament should not play this adventure, as spoilers are inevitable.

rpgseries: VEL - Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventures
211506.name: Chasing Keys
211506.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The assassination of Baron Stephen Nital has stoked the firestorm of accusation and political maneuvering between the church and nobility. The force behind the assassination needs to be brought to justice. But conflicting forces have other plans.

A one-round regional adventure set in Archclericy of Veluna for characters level 5 - 15.

rpgseries: VEL - Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventures
211507.name: Hound at Bay
211507.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

An ill wind is blowing in Whitehale Diocese. Some believe that fanning the flames will bring a reprieve from tyranny while others fear the flames of rebellion. Others look on to see what benefit they can gain from turmoil. Which side will you choose?

A Veluna regional adventure for characters level 1 to 10.

rpgseries: VEL - Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventures
211508.name: Border Watch
211508.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Rumbles of war in the Baklunish West have prompted Canon Truft to begin closing Veluna's borders, prompting an outcry from factions both noble and religious. But is the internal dissent due to what some see as an unreasoned decision, or to his choice for the vanguard of the Vale's defense? The security of Veluna is being entrusted to ... bards? Rao help us all.

A one-round Regional adventure set in the Archclericy of Veluna that allows for real characters to shine; level 1 - 14.

211509.name: Elements & Idols
211509.description:
Description from the publisher:

Elements and Idols is a deck building game where the scoring conditions, like the elements, are constantly in flux.

Each season, players will roll dice to see what their villagers demand of them and will then attempt to alter their decks to accommodate those demands.

Unlike traditional deckbuilders, your deck isn't your score but rather a tool for scoring throughout the game. By building a deck which satisfies your villages needs you will score frequently. But be careful to remain flexible as time constantly erodes your deck and the demand of the villagers is ever changing.

rpgseries: VEL - Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventures
211510.name: Harbinger of Shadows
211510.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Veluna Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Redin Sarneth tossed and turned, his sheets soaked with sweat, shadows flitting in and out of his fevered dreams. Something hid in the darkness just out of sight, some presence. In a voice cracked with the age of the oldest scrolls, it spoke in a whisper... "I am not the pretender Sancredia. I am the end!"

A two round Regional adventure that ties up loose ends; set in the Archclericy of Veluna for characters level 4 - 15.

This adventure includes an extended play option, which could include untiered encounters.

Special thanks to Casey Hoch and his work on the Brotherhood of the Vale.

211512.name: Pyramid (Volume 3, Issue 96 - Oct 2016)
211512.description:
Upgrade your tomorrow.

The future is waiting to be determined. Expand your possibilities with this month's issue of Pyramid, the PDF magazine for roleplayers. With "High-Tech Buildings" by Matt Riggsby, you'll construct modern and futuristic structures, complete with amenities. In David L. Pulver's latest column, devise ultra-tech armor that fits your vision. Whether you're looking for offensive upgrades, defensive options, or new ideas to augment your campaign, this issue is the bleeding edge of fun!

211513.name: Prospectica
211513.description:
Description from the publisher:

Prospectica is a 2 to 4 player card game with a theme of mining asteroids in space. The object of the game is to be the first player to successfully find, seed and mine three unique asteroids.

The gameplay changes depending on your starship and various upgrades you may attach to it such as Engines, Drills and Storage.

These upgrades can affect your the number of cards you may draw, how many minerals you can mine and how many cards you can hold in your hand.

Players take turns drawing from the draw pile or discard pile. The goal is to draw a small, medium and large asteroid from the deck and play them face up in front of the player. Once at least on asteroid is played, the player can then begin to seed the asteroid with mineral cards (also found in the deck).

There are six unique minerals, and each asteroid has a requirement of how many minerals are needed to seed it. Once a player has the correct number of minerals for the asteroid, they play them on top of the face up asteroids they have discovered so far.

The final step for the player is to mine the minerals on a fully seeded asteroid. Players only seed and mine their own asteroids. To mine an asteroid, the player must use a pricing contract card (found throughout the deck). These pricing cards have various values from 20 to 120 and are an important part of the scoring. The player is allowed to mine one mineral for each drill on their starship per contract card they hold.

Once the player fully depletes an asteroid of minerals, they turn it sideways to score additional points. The first player to mine all three of the asteroids wins the hand, and all players tally their score up to that point.

The first player to reach 4000 points wins the game. This usually requires a multiple hands of play to achieve.

boardgamecompilation: Escape: Zombie City – Expansion 1 – The Survivor Chronicles
211514.description:
Description from the publisher:

What's Escape: Zombie City?
Let’s start with what Escape Zombie City is not. It is not Escape The Cursed Temple with a zombie theme. What it is, is a real-time, cooperative game, the timer for the game is a soundtrack. But this game plays in 15 min. and there are two phases to the game: collection of goods, spawning and fighting of zombies and then in the second phase of the game a cooperative escape from the city in a van loaded up with the collected goods fighting more zombies along the way.

What's in this Big Box edition?

Escape Zombie City (base game)
Escape Zombie City: The Survival Chronicles Expansion 1
Queenie 1
Queenie 2
Queenie 3
211514.name: Escape: Zombie City – Big Box

rpgseries: SBN - Living Greyhawk Sea Baron Regional Adventures
211516.name: Fiori Neri
211516.description:
Avventura Nazionale Sea Barons Living Greyhawk in un round

From the introduction:

I personaggi devono accompagnare un'erborista elfa alla ricerca di alcuni "fiori neri." Il loro viaggio, per mare e per terra, sarà ricco di insidie e pericoli.

Un'avventura per personaggi di 1° livello.

The characters must accompany an herbalist elf looking for some "blacks flowers." Their trip, by sea and by land, will be full of pitfalls and dangers.

An adventure for 1st-level characters.

211517.name: Nel Covo Dei Pirati
rpgseries: SBN - Living Greyhawk Sea Baron Regional Adventures
211517.description:
Avventura Nazionale Sea Barons Living Greyhawk in un round

From the introduction:

La nave con cui i personaggi tornano a Porto Antico viene assalita da pirati che rapiscono l'erborista elfa scortata dagli avventurieri. Con l'aiuto de Yendrenn Harquill, ammiraglio di Isola Bella, gli avventurieri tentano di infiltrarsi in una città di Isola Stretta controllata dai pirati, per liberare la prigioniera. Questa avventure è il seguito diretto di SBN1-01: Fiori Neri, ma può anche essere giocata da sola.

The character's ship returns to the Old Port where it is attacked by pirates who kidnap the herbalist elf. With the help of Yendrenn Harquill, Admiral of Isola Bella, the adventurers try to infiltrate a city of Isola Stretta, controlled by pirates, to free the prisoner. This adventure is the direct result of [rpgitem = 211516], but can also be played alone.

rpgseries: SBN - Living Greyhawk Sea Baron Regional Adventures
211518.name: Howl in the Storm
211518.description:
A One-Round Regional Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

During a storm, a vessel bearing no insignia is stranded on a coral reef off the northern coast of Oakenisle. Who can be so desperate to sail during a storm and why [have] they decided to go incognito? Is there a party of proud adventurers who will accept the challenge of investigating the ship before the storm sinks both the ship and its secrets?

211519.name: Bone March Journal 594 CY
211519.description:
A Supplement for the Living Greyhawk Campaign Setting

From the introduction:

This year has been difficult for Bone March. A lot of new alliances have been made and a lot of new hostilities have broken out. Nonhumans continue to rampage the land and occupy Spinecastle and Johnsport. One more year and the proper ruler of Bone March is absent, presumed dead by almost all now.

In this chaos, a logical man Count Joachim Dunstan continues his efforts to uphold his County intact against the orc invaders. At the small town of Nivlek Landed Knight Bae continues his effort to build a decent city. Landed Lord Lynette defended his village during the Battle of Nlul, and many adventurers are now known in the region of the March.

211520.name: The County of Knurl Gazetteer
211520.description:
A Supplement for the Living Greyhawk Campaign Setting

From the introduction:

There is a land forgotten by the gods of good and light. There is a wasteland dominated by chaos, deceit, betrayal and evil. This area is Bone March. Between its vast dry plains, thousands of people are roaming the land just to survive from the orc raids and the bandit gangs. Despite this however, there is a spark of hope. The County of Knurl stands tall protected by heroes who are more than willing to spread the light of heroism once more. New towns are beginning to form and great men are bound to protect their freedom once more.

211521.name: First Blood
rpgseries: BNM - Living Greyhawk Bone March Regional Adventures
211521.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Bone March Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A ranger of the village of Nlul discovers two small Orc scout camps at the outskirts of the village. The PC's are hired by the garrison (the military) to neutralize the threat. The PC's will have to get familiar with the Nlul surroundings and by using the Ranger's map, go undetected and neutralize the camps.

211522.name: Run Like Hell!
rpgseries: BNM - Living Greyhawk Bone March Regional Adventures
211522.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Bone March Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The PCs are hired to protect a wagon which is carrying important documents, from the village of Nlul to the town of Nivlek. However things will soon get out of control...

An adventure for [character levels] 2 - 6.

211523.name: Bright Sun
rpgseries: BNM - Living Greyhawk Bone March Regional Adventures
211523.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Bone March Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The [player characters] are charged with the responsibility of clearing up a part of the dwarven abandoned mine residing in the County of Knurl, so that it can be used by miners once more. With the ore running fluently from the hills, the village of Nlul might be able to raise funds so that it can be in a position to repel the orc invasion.

An adventure made for [character levels] 2 - 8.

211524.name: Call to Arms!
rpgseries: BNM - Living Greyhawk Bone March Regional Adventures
211524.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Bone March Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The much-anticipated orc assault on the village of Nlul is about ready to begin. The PCs have the difficult task of neutralizing the officers of the enemy horde and capturing their battle plans. Can a handful of heroes change the tide of the upcoming great battle?

A two-round scenario for [character levels] 2 - 8.

211525.name: Deadly Alliance
rpgseries: BNM - Living Greyhawk Bone March Regional Adventures
211525.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Bone March Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A beautiful damsel in distress turns to the PCs for aid to save her brother. The poor young man is being held captive by a mysterious powerful humanoid. Can the PCs infiltrate the cave, and rescue the young man?

A Bone March adventure near the Blemu Hills for [character levels] 2 - 8.

211526.name: A Paladin on the Run
rpgseries: BNM - Living Greyhawk Bone March Regional Adventures
211526.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Bone March Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A paladin runs for his life and stumbles across a group of adventurers. The poor man is badly wounded and in a state of shock, screaming about a mysterious tower and very dangerous opponents. Can this be true, or it is the raving of a young man on the verge of insanity? Do the adventurers have what it takes to check out for themselves the horrors of this mysterious building?

An Adventure for [character levels] 2 - 8.

211527.name: DUSK
211527.description:
Battle through an onslaught of mystical backwater cultists, possessed militants and even darker forces as you attempt to discover just what lurks beneath the earth in this retro FPS inspired by all your 90's favorites.

Source: The Publisher Website.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211528.name: Freedom of Speech
211528.description:
A Mini-Module for Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

For use as an introduction to CORS2-01: The Fright at Tristor.

A Sunndi Regional Mini-Module for characters level 1 - 6.

User summary:

This Mini-Module was formally "retired" from play.

211529.description:
Description from the designer:

Battle For the Universe is a competitive, two-player card game, where players construct decks to prove they lead the ultimate superpowered team in Slab City! The players choose Heroes, Villains, or anything in between, along with locations where they can square off to display their prowess or save the day.

Slab City Beatdown is the core set for Battle For The Universe, introducing players to a world in which the characters interact. Will Slab City be ruled by one Villain? Will the Heroes rescue enough civilians to save the day? What secrets are hidden in the city streets? The fate of Slab City is in your hands!

In this game, players will create a unit of 54 cards. They will choose a Base, which will detail the team the player has chosen. They will choose an Objective, which tells them if they are heroic or villainous, it also determines the goal in which they need to accomplish to win the game. They will create a 40-card play deck, with characters, objects, and one-shot single use action cards. Lastly, they will choose a 12-card Location deck to represent where the epic battles in Slab City will take place. Battle For The Universe has multiple paths to victory, and not all involve killing your opponent. Some players may opt to rescue civilians. Others may try to amass wealth or simply beat and bring opposing characters to justice. All of these goals are possible, and more. Battle For The Universe: Slab City Beatdown has over 300 cards in its base set to build your most powerful team!

Coming to Kickstarter January 10, 2017
211529.name: Battle for the Universe: Slab City Beatdown

211530.name: Super Destronaut 2: Go Duck Yourself
211530.description:
ollect power-ups to increase your firepower and multiplier coins to reach unbeatable high scores. Shoot those alien butts in Classic, Time Attack, Hardcore or Invaders mode.

Source: The Publisher Website.

211531.name: Crown Champion: Legends of the Arena
211531.description:
User Summary

Develop your academy and train your fighters. Increase your power and influence in the realm. Reap the rewards of your labours.

211532.name: Awkward Dimensions Redux
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Best Student Game Honorable Mention
211532.description:
They may be awkward dimensions, but they're my dreams...

Source: The Developer Website.

211533.description:
Description from the publisher:

In Veggie Garden, 2-4 players are trying to grow the best vegetables in a short amount of time — but it won't be easy as other players will be fighting for space in the garden, and the pesky groundhog and mischievous bunny will be popping up at every turn!
211533.name: Veggie Garden
boardgamepodcastepisode: #44: Anachrony six-pack review and on tap; Fugitive; Valeria Card Kingdoms; Veggie Garden

211534.description:
Bears vs Babies is a card game in which you build handsome, incredible monsters who go to war with horrible, awful babies.

The shared deck of cards consists of bear parts (and other monster parts) and baby cards. When you draw a part, you use it to build a monster for yourself; when you draw a baby, it goes in the center of the table. When babies are provoked, they attack, and anyone who has fewer monster parts than the number of attacking babies loses their monster; everyone with more parts than babies defeats this infantile army and scores.
211534.name: Bears vs Babies

211535.name: United We Stand
rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211535.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Another wave of banditry is plaguing the county of Pelsand. No caravan seems safe. No home secure, and while the authorities of New Keep are buying grain cheap from farmers that do not dare risk to lose their cargo, a small group of peasants unite to fight those that destroy their crops. They can do with a bit of help.

The Blood of Aerdy Cycle.

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211536.name: Blood of Innocent
211536.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A new year has started and as usual the counts of Sunndi have traveled to Pitchfield to attend the first meeting of the Congress of Lords in this year. To garner support from their peers and even the populace for new plans, the various political factions organize festivities and meetings. Then, in broad daylight, the leader of the League is kidnapped. Will you prevail and keep Sunndi a player in the international politics of the league?

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211537.name: The Evil Eye
211537.description:
A Mini-Module for Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

Cattle die in a quiet village just after the local wise woman looked into it. Now the villagers want to see blood.

A Sunndi regional mini-module for characters level 1 - 6.

User summary:

This Mini-Module was formally "retired" from play.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211538.name: Dangerous Transport
211538.description:
A Mini-Scenario for Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

A citizen of Sunndi has been collecting weapons for over a year to donate to the Freedom Fighters of Onnwal in their struggles against the Scarlet Brotherhood. Now somebody offered him a load of weapons. These weapons need to be transported to him first though, which might not be as easy as it sounds.

A Sunndi regional mini-module for characters level 1 - 6.

User summary:

This Mini-Module was formally "retired" from play.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211539.name: The Onnwallian Envoy
211539.description:
A Mini-Scenario for Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

Onnwal has sent a secret envoy to Sunndi to discuss any official involvement of Sunndi in the liberation of Onnwal. The Scarlet Brotherhood already tried to stop the envoy from reaching Sunndi in Onnwal once before. Will they try it again in Sunndi?

This Mini-Module is part of several mini modules that involves the first inter-regional plotline for Sunndi. It is the sequel to The Envoy, a mini-module played within Onnwal.

A Sunndi regional mini-module for characters level 1 - 8.

User summary:

This Mini-Module was formally "retired" from play.

211540.name: Dungeon Fighter: King Cobra Bonus Card
211540.description:
King Cobra bonus card for Dungeon Fighter.

King Cobra (also featured in "Raise Your Goblets") has a way with poison - Allows you to deal damage to monsters, heal if you can hit the goblet with a dice or make a grand toast for the entire party.

211541.name: Faites entrer l'accusé
211541.description:
Wear the suit inspector and find the murderer!

Box content :
- 20 leaflets
- 40 cards
- 1 dice
- 1 book

Inspired by the major criminal cases, this box set offers to solve twenty investigations in providing you with clues, evidence, autopsy report, testimony and other elements.

To win the game, you'll have to be the fastest player to find the murderer and motivation, without being disturb by drawing the "hazard' cards!

211546.name: Stories from the Grave
211546.description:
From publisher blurb:

Stories from the Grave is a roleplaying game that faithfully emulates anthology-style horror comics, TV shows and movies. It is powered by the Intention System, the same rule set that powers Retrostar, though it has been extensively altered so that it accommodates the play style necessary to bring the source material to dripping, oozing, gore-soaked un-life.

SftG is built around making it possible to play out several short stories in a single setting, with each one feeling exactly like the kinds of tales spun in the comics, shows and films of the genre.
The game is powered by a heavily modified version of the Intention System (the ruleset used for Retrostar). It’s simple, narrative and encourages players to have plenty of control over how the story progresses.
The system is fast and easy to learn. In fact, the actual rules take up just over 12 pages.
Character creation is a very simple matter that takes 15 minutes or less.
Players are rewarded more for making the story more entertaining than for "staying alive". As anyone who is familiar with the source material can tell you, many of these stories focused on truly reprehensible people who ultimately get their just comeuppance.
Players can acquire help from a communal pool of Grave Tokens that can be snatched up and used to lend a hand... but not without a price. After all, one of the main themes of anthology-style horror is that you can never get something for nothing.
The Grave Keeper has plenty of tools at their disposal as well, including Story Frames that can be used as the foundation for virtually any tale imaginable. Every effort has been made to keep it easy to set up and run games of Stories from the Grave.
You’ll find details for all the most common Story Frames, including “Careful What You Wish For”, “Consequences”, “Hapless” and more.
The rulebook contains a full-blown sample installment (aka adventure) to get you started with.
An exhaustive 8-page “example of play” covering the entirety of an installment will help players and Grave Keepers to better grasp the finer points of the rules.

211547.name: Odin's Eye: First Lieutenant
211547.description:
From publisher blurb:

The First Lieutenant is the second-in-command aboard the Odin’s Eye. He is the Captain’s most trustworthy ally, maintaining personal relationships with the crew, so the Captain can focus on running the ship. Most of the crew turn to the First Lieutenant when they have problems. As a result, the First Lieutenant has taken a backseat to the glory most of the crew receive — which is why he’s an aging First Lieutenant instead of a captain.

In Odin’s Eye, the characters are search and rescue specialists aboard a galaxy-hopping spaceship. They’re dedicated, highly-trained, and often sent into impossibly hostile places. Their motto — “No Star Unturned” — serves as a reminder to never give up, even when the mission could spell their doom.

211548.name: Arcanostatic Corruption
211548.description:
From publisher blurb:

Power by the Gigawatt!

Corruptions, from Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Horror Adventures, give players a new way to indulge their dark fantasies and take the role of gothic monsters, infecting themselves with some taint or darkness, and presenting the tantalizing question of whether to struggle against the corruption, or embrace it, and allow themselves to bask, however briefly, in its dark power. While Horror Adventures presents 11 different corruptions to choose from, there are many more potential sources of corruption that could potentially be explored.

This book presents the arcanostatic corruption, a brand new corruption for those whose bodies course with arcane energy far beyond their power to control, which causes spontaneous outbursts of raw magical might at unexpected times. The corruption includes 10 manifestations and its own unique progression rules, including innovative new rules governing the wild arcanostatic outbursts. Further, the book introduces three particularly powerful spells, each of which has the serious drawback of potentially inflicting the arcanostatic corruption on those who cast them.

211549.name: Seeds of Evil
211549.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Whispers of the Dark Mother Mini-Adventure Path is here!

This six-part adventure pits characters from the small trading Town of Brighton against the sinister Cult of Shub-Niggurath, The Black Goat of the Woods with a Thousand Young! Characters begin their adventuring careers after arriving in town where they accept an innocuous task that leads them down the trail of unspeakable horror. This six-chapter quest takes characters from level 1 to level 7, and is perfect for GM’s seeking an alternative opening act to other published adventure paths.

Utilizing material from [The Guide to the Cult of Shub-Niggurath, players start in the Town of Brighton, voyage through the cut-throat alleys of Griffonport, navigate haunted mansions in the capitol city, and then face off against the legendary Beast of Bright Mountain Valley.

Chapter One: Seeds of Evil begins the character’s journey against the foul cult. Written by Robert Gresham, “Seeds” is a sandbox-style adventure that catapults the PC’s into the dangerous wilds surrounding Brighton, setting the stage for further installments of the adventure path.

Included is an updated overview of The Grey Maiden, Brynndell’s chief goddess, by Ewan Cummins, and a new monster, the arcane Gate Willow, by Jarrett Sigler.

211550.name: Dark Colony
211550.description:
From publisher blurb:

In the depths of space, Fleet discovered a new class M planet, devoid of all but the simplest life forms, and brimming with sought-after manzakium ore deposits. An orbital outpost was rapidly built to support the immediate colonization of the planet, and a small mining colony was rapidly erected upon the surface. Progress was rapid for the first 8 days.

...and then equipment began disappearing. A vehicle belonging to a survey team caught fire for no readily apparent reason, and a transport from the space station arrived covered in a strange grey dust. The space dock workers suffered from some strange new disease, and were immediately quarantined. Since that time, the colony has continually reported in that everything is fine, and proceeding according to expectations.

We called your team because every time the colony reports in, the report is identical to its predecessor. Our analysts predict the odds of that happening at several million to one. We fear that the colony has gone dark.

A large but manageable space colony with a multi-level plotline awaits your expert hand as Game Master. It is written using generic statistics and language to enable compatibility with most science-fiction rpg systems.

Not for the faint of heart, Dark Colony is designed for exploration by three or more well-equipped characters of moderate levels of skill and experience. It can be used as either a stand-alone adventure or as the sequel to Dark Outpost or Dark Visitor.

There are many ways to die in space. We just added a few more (yet again).

211551.name: Kung Fu Combo
211551.description:
Description from the publisher:

Kung Fu Combo is a fast action 2 player card game.
Players take turns attacking and defending until one player is reduced to zero(0) life points and is knocked out.

You take on one of the sacred animal masters; Crane, Tiger, Leopard or Snake. Attack with combination flurry's by matching colors, numbers, sequences or both.
You defend by blocking your opponents attacks by matching numbers or forming defensive combo's by adding and subtracting your cards to perform the proper block.

You decide if you want to lean heavily on defense or rely on your attacks, or try and balance the two.

211552.name: Halloween
211552.description:
From publisher blurb:

Tricks, Treats, and Terror!

Mythic Monsters: Halloween brings you an awesome assortment of autumnal enemies drawn from the legends and lore of Halloween and the harvest with a healthy dose of horror. You'll find 15 monsters from CR 1 to 17, from simple bat swarms to disembodied body parts like floating beheaded, creeping crawling hands, and stitched-together carrion golems. The fruit of the harvest can be friendly or fearsome, from charming gourd leshies to murderous jack-o'-lanterns and deadly hangman trees. Some Halloween horrors are found in the dusty crannies of haunted houses, like the sinister soulbound doll or the anguished loneliness of the attic whisperer, or may stalk the shadowed lanes of civilized places stealing what others hold most dear like the silent shadow collector. Of course, beyond the trehshold of midnight treads the stuff of purest nightmare come to deadly unlife in the form of the crawling host of the deathweb or the entropic shadows of the soaring nightwing. As if over a dozen existing monsters were not enough, this book brings you two different torch-wielding mobs, from terrified villagers to terrorizing fanatics. In addition to the featured creatures, you'll find mythic feats to help your heroes and villains become headless horsemen and ghost riders, as well as a quartet of whimsical treasures perfect for tricks and treats with the ghostly gossamer, goblin mask, witch's broom, and sack of gluttony! Grab this fantastic 32-page Pathfinder monster supplement today and Make Your Game Legendary!

211553.name: The Necrotic Verses
211553.description:
From publisher blurb:

Music and Madness!

The Necrotic Verses is a book of mystic secrets grounded in the corrupted composition of a musical maestro whose otherworldly obsessions drove him to madness and beyond yet left behind magical masterpieces like the Dead Man's Frolic, Dance of the Empty Moons, and the Opus of the Golden King! Power awaits all who dare to delve into the sinister secrets contained within The Necrotic Verses! Grab this 10-page 5E supplement today and Make Your Game Legendary!

In 5th Edition campaigns where horror, madness, or tragedy play a central theme, blasphemous books and tomes of terror often play a key role in unlocking sinister secrets man was not meant to know. Each Gothic Grimoire is evocative and richly detailed, with history and character that makes them far more than a collection of dusty pages that deliver intriguing possibilities for introducing novel applications of the rules of your favorite role-playing game. These are Tomes of Ancient Knowledge (5E), dialed up to eleven.

211554.name: Gorillaconda
211554.description:
From publisher blurb:

LowFy TV Studio is shooting its new monster movie in San José, featuring a giant prehistoric gorilla-anaconda hybrid. But on the set things keep going wrong day after day and rumours begin to circulate that the movie is cursed!

An introductory adventure for Tropicana, for 3-6 Novice Heroes or a Startup Agency.

211555.name: Lost in San Jose
211555.description:
From publisher blurb:

In this pdf you will find 5 pregenerated characters. These characters are perfect for adventures where troubles conspire against the player characters! These aren’t exactly action heroes (yet!), but neither they’re hopeless losers – sooner or later they will surely get involved in some kind of trouble...

211556.name: Prisma Service
211556.description:
From publisher blurb:

A pregenerated agency for Tropicana, with 6 ready characters.

This Agency has its headquarters in the basement of a XVII century palace in La Laguna.
Thanks to its members’ varied skills and backgrounds, Prisma Service offers a wide range of services, from delicate investigation to unusual transportation and delivery, to smooth solutions for rough problems.
Motto: “Our experience, your satisfaction”

211557.description:
User summary (English):
Promo card available at Spiel 2016 in Essen. It remembers 20 years Rivals of Catan. It is a neutral action.

Card text:
Either take a resource of your choice or choose 1 card out of 1 pile of your choice. Your opponent may use the option not chosen by you. If 1 city hall is owned, you may take 2 cards out of 1 pile or take 2 resources.

User summary (German):
Sonderkarte von der Spiel 2016 in Essen. Sie erinnert an das Jubiläum "20 Jahre Catan - das Spiel für 2". Es handelt sich um eine neutrale Aktion.
211557.name: Catan: Das Duell – Sonderkarte 2016: 20 Jahre Catan, das Spiel für 2

211558.name: Hot Wheels
211558.description:
From publisher blurb:

Once upon a time in the Caribbean...

The rich lawyer Julio Hernandez is worried about his daughter Josefina, and with good reason! A few weeks ago she destroyed her very expensive car, and… the best is yet to come! Hired by Hernandez, the Heroes are asked to watch over her.

One Page Adventure for Tropicana by Mauro Longo and Giuseppe Rotondo

An introductory adventure for Tropicana, for 3-6 Novice Heroes or a Startup Agency. Prepare for brawls and wild chases in the streets of the exotic city of San José, where the Heroes must protect a wild girl who can’t stay away from danger.

boardgamecompilation: Among the Stars: Revival – Kickstarter Stretch Goals
211559.description:
Given out as a Promo by Artipia at Spiel 2016.

If you discard this card to build a Power reactor, pay 1 less.
If you discard this card to gain gain 1 more.
211559.name: Among the Stars: Consulting Firm

211561.name: UFO
211561.description: UFO is a 2-player game from Alga, a game in the Algette series (no.5). One players is red, the other is black, and each players has 1 pawn in their colour and 9 cards. The players need to play cards from there hands with number on them. The number represent the steps the players pawns will move. There as always two numbers on each cards, one red and one black. There are four cicles on the board, to get to another circle, the pawns has to land on an square with an arrow. The aim is be the first player to reach the middle of the board.

211562.name: Apocalypse World 2nd Ed Basic Reference & Playbooks
211562.description:
User summary

This downloadable pack includes the MC worksheets (Threats, Map, MC Moves), shared character moves (Basic, Peripheral, Battle, Harm, quick reference), and the following eleven 'basic' character playbooks, revised for Second Edition:


Basic Playbooks


Angel
Battlebabe
Brainer
Chopper
Driver
Gunlugger
Hardholder
Hocus
Maestro D'
Savvyhead
Skinner

211563.name: Apocalypse World 2nd Ed Extended Playbooks
211563.description:
User summary

This downloadable pack includes the following six 'extended' character playbooks, revised for Second Edition:


Basic Playbooks


Child-thing
Faceless
News
Show
Quarantine
Waterbearer

211564.name: Auralux: Constellations
211564.description:
Auralux: Constellations is the awaited sequel to Auralux, the critically acclaimed minimalistic Real Time Strategy game. Explore a dozen new gameplay mechanics through each constellation, one new feature at a time. It's Real-­Time Strategy, deconstructed.

Source: The Game Website.

211565.name: Unavowed
211565.description:
User Summary

Part RPG, part adventure game, Unavowed is the next project from Wadjet Eye Games.

211566.name: Let Them Come
211566.description:
Let Them Come is a fast paced pixel art shoot ‘em up. Twitchy trigger fingers and focused battle tactics are the order of the day as wave after wave of alien-like creatures try to take you down.

Source: The Game Website.

211567.name: Antihero
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Excellence in Design Honorable Mention
2017 PAX Curse Award Best Digital Board Game of the Year Winner
2017 SXSW Gamer's Voice: Best Indie Game of the Year (Multiplayer) Nominee
211567.description:
Run a thieves’ guild in a gas-lit underworld.

Antihero is a fast-paced strategy game with an (Oliver) Twist. Recruit urchins, hire thugs, kit out your master thief, upgrade your guild… and bribe, blackmail, and assassinate your opposition.

Source: The Game Website.

211568.name: Super Dungeon Tactics
211568.description:
Super Dungeon Tactics is a tactical turn-based game in which players create a guild of Heroes to combat the Dark Consul’s forces throughout Crystalia. As the guild master you choose to take on bounties, answer the pleas of the public, or answer a noble call to adventure.

Source: The Game Website.

211569.name: The Silver Case
211569.description:
1999 - the "24 Wards". A string of mysterious serial killings plagues the city. The detectives of the 24 Wards Heinous Crimes Unit have their eyes on one man: Kamui Uehara, legendary serial killer and assassin of a number of government officials 20 years prior in the now-famous "Silver Case". However, nobody knows who - or what - Kamui really is.

Source: The Game Website.

211570.name: Open Sorcery
211570.description:
Open Sorcery is a game about technology, magic and becoming a person.

Source: The Game Website.

211571.name: Asura
videogamehonor: 2017 SXSW Gamer's Voice: Best Indie Game of the Year (Single player) Nominee
211571.description:
User Summary

Asura is a Hack 'n' Slash game with rogue-like elements and procedurally generated skill tree. Loosely inspired from Indian mythos, play as Asura, the demon incarnate and obliterate your way through the randomly generated fortress of the Daeva empire.

211572.name: World of Dungeons Turbo: Breakers
rpgpodcastepisode: Episode 98 - Breakers, Cthulhu Dark: Confidential, Kuro
211572.description:
User summary

Breakers presents both a revised implementation of the core 'World of Dungeons' mechanics and a self-contained playset game.

Characters are working class heroes seeking fame & fortune while exploring the mashed-up borderlands created when Earth collided with another realm.

Page count notes: 2 pages rules, 1 page example monsters & notes, 1 page character sheets.

211574.name: Objects in Space
211574.description:
Objects in Space is a modempunk stealth space-trading game set in Apollo – a huge cluster of star systems dozens of lightyears away from Earth. You are a lonesome ship’s captain, buying and selling wares in order to keep your bucket of bolts afloat and stay one step ahead of pirates, organised criminals, corrupt governments and shady laws.

Source: The Game Website.

211575.name: Bleed 2
211575.description:
Bleed 2 is a relentless arcade action game featuring air-dodging, bullet-reflecting, and tons of bosses.

Source: The Game Website.

211576.name: Brawlout
211576.description:
Brawlout is the competitive platform fighter.

Source: The Game Website.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211577.name: Murky Waters
211577.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

There is always trouble afoot at the border region with the Vast Swamp and rumours of undead raiders are drawing you to Nondrinn. For safety you join a trading caravan that is headed in the same direction, but can safety in number protect you this close to the Vast Swamp?

An adventure for [character levels] 2 - 8.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211578.name: The Monster in the Hills
211578.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A monster has been sighted in the Hollow Highlands. Folk bar their doors and have mobilised the militia. Will the heroes be able to hunt down this creature and protect the inhabitants of the area?

For [character levels] 2 - 8.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211579.name: From the Ashes
211579.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Regional Mini-Scenario

From the introduction:

The temple of Pelor in Axebjerg has been destroyed, it’s foundation ravaged by fire. The raising of a new house has begin, but tensions run high on the grounds as accidents happen all too frequently. Is one of the Ahlissan employees working sabotage? Or is a more nefarious force at work?

A regional Mini-Module for [character] levels 1 - 8.

211580.name: Stronghold of the Venomous Wyrm
211580.description:
From publisher blurb:

Today we present FV10 - Stronghold of the Venomous Wyrm a higher level adventure for a group of adventurers. Sightings of a large Green Dragon have become more and more frequent and the shipping lanes are becoming regular targets. The duke has sent a military contingent but no word has come from that group. Is your party ready to lend a hand against an extremely dangerous foe?

This adventure setting was designed for 5th Edition AD&D for the Filbar Campaign for a group of 4-6 adventurers that are level 8th to 10th. This adventure is easily adaptable to most any game and system.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211581.name: Harsh Words
211581.description:
A Living Greyhawk Mini-Module Adventure

From the introduction:

There has been peace between Ahlissa and Sunndi since the end of the Greyhawk Wars. Due to the blockade of the Tilva Strait by the Scarlet Brotherhood and the tension with Ahlissa, markets to the west of Sunndi have remained closed for Sunndian goods. The time is ripe for negotiations for a trade agreement with Ahlissa. These negotiations are of special importance because relations between Sunndi and Ahlissa need to be at their best or else helping the Onnwalians fight the Scarlet Brotherhood will be impossible. Centuries of war though cannot be forgotten as easily as some people might hope.

Part of the Iron Soldiers Series.

User summary:

For 2nd - 8th level characters.

211582.name: Sewers of Evil
211582.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Walled City of Vandosia sits on the bay and is surrounded on three sides by water. One of the more interesting features of this city is its massive sewer system that keeps water and waste flowing out of the city. Rumors have it that these tunnels are home to special problems of its own. Are your players ready to brave the gritty underside of Vandosia?

This adventure setting was designed for the 5th Edition AD&D for the Filbar Campaign for several different levels of adventurers. This adventure is easily adaptable to most any game and system.

211583.name: Ziggurat of Narvi
211583.description:
From publisher blurb:

As the fledgling adventurers continue their movement throughout the area they begin to head towards the bustling Port City of Kak. To get to there from the Dy’oe Grasslands the party will need to navigate a river running along an overgrown section of the frontier. After obtaining the services of a strange riverboat captain the party heads down the river and into adventure! Between the wildlife, a mysterious old temple, and river pirates the party discovers getting to Kak is easier said than done!

This adventure setting was designed for 5th Edition AD&D for the Filbar Campaign for a lower level group of adventurers and DM. This adventure is easily adaptable to most any game and system.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211584.name: Needles and Pins
211584.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Interactive

From the introduction:

The Pitchfield Merchant Guild seeks some trustworthy individuals for a simple yet important task. All that is required is knowing how to swing a hammer. And no fear to get some dirt under ones fingernails.

A Regional mini scenario for [character levels] 2 - 10.

211585.name: The Behemoth Corruption
211585.description:
From publisher blurb:

Hunger, a primal need to eat in order to stave off death by starvation. It is something experienced by every living creature. However, in some the hunger grows unchecked, driving a creature to consume more than they need. These unfortunates are cursed to become Behemoths, doomed to gorge themselves upon anything.... or anyone in their vicinity. They transform into obese blobs of giant unnatural flesh, consuming anything that crosses their path.

It is said that the Behemoth corruption is one of seven corruptions, each tied to a different deadly sin. The Behemoth corruption is connected to the sin of Gluttony, but other similar corruptions also exist. It is believed these seven corruptions are the handiwork of powerful demon lords, seeking to spread their particular sin to the mortal world by using this corruption to create powerful lieutenants.

211586.name: Sulis!
211586.description:
From publisher blurb:

From publisher blurb:

The Amazing Races PDFs introduce new archetypes, feats, character traits, racial traits, and archetypes for the core, featured, and uncommon races described in the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Advanced Race Guide. Every PDF contains two full pages of high quality content (no fluff or filler)!

Amazing Races: Sulis! includes new racial feats, suli character traits, and alternate racial traits for wayangs. In addition, this product features a new archetype for suli alchemists: the Elemental Thaumaturge!

211587.name: Happier Little Automatons
211587.description:
From publisher blurb:

It's a happy little expansion to a happy little expansion, and it's sold right here.

Lowbie tinkers, this one's for you! The Remedial Tinkering line represents a dramatic shift in the way tinker expansions are designed and delivered. Rather than focusing on long-term class goals, Remedial Tinkering presents new subsystems that are viable right out of the gate at level 1 and only get better with more investment at the later levels.

Happier Little Automatons expands upon the [Paint] invention subtype first released in Endzeitgeist top 10 nominee Happy Little Automatons. Unlike most inventions, paint is fairly easy to apply; while it can be quite difficult to add, say, a lightning gun to an automaton after it has already been turned on, a slathering of red paint (which, of course, makes it go faster) is as easy as upending a bucket. As a result, those who invest in [Paint] will find that this subtype is incredibly malleable and allows for the quick swapping of minor bonuses whenever and wherever, with some fancy inventions that consume coats of paint for larger, albeit temporary bonuses. Combo play, artistic hauteur, and somehow making lightning bolts use paint for fuel is the name of the game with Happier Little Automatons.

Happier Little Automatons absolutely requires Happy Little Automatons and the original Tinker Base Class to play.

Product Features

An invention subtypes cheat sheet for those who don't have all the tinker expansions
4 new tinker innovations
2 new tinker greater innovations
16 new tinker inventions

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211588.name: Spring Cleaning
211588.description:
An Introduction Module set in Sunndi; Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

Spring is a good time for fairs, markets, and similar festivities, even for the sober dwarves. All winter they have worked in their forges to create metal marvels, and now, they bring their creations into the light, for sale.

N.B. [characters] who already played the Mini Spring Cleaning can not participate in this scenario.

User summary:

For new characters.

See also SND4-01M: Spring Cleaning

211589.description:
This expansion pack adds an entirely new deck and gameplay mechanism to Valeria: Card Kingdoms. Available to every player, you have the option to hire an agent for one turn to take advantage of their unique skill. Want to take out an opponent's Summoner? Hire the Assassin! This expansion pack should have a kickstarter of its own because it will add a huge amount of fun to an already awesome game!

This expansion was included in the Kickstarted expansion, Flames and Frost.
211589.name: Valeria: Card Kingdoms – Expansion Pack #03: Agents

211590.description:
Promo card given out by Artipia Games at Spiel 2016.

Card text:
Discard this card and spawn an Alien Boss in its place. It still counts towards the number of Alien cards spawned this round.
211590.name: Project: ELITE – Spawn a Boss Promo Card

211591.name: Sega Strike Fighter
211591.description: User Summary: An arcade game, a flight simulator, with different missions in a modern war setting. The game was released in two cabinet styles Deluxe and Standard.

211592.name: Us vs Them
211592.description: User Summary: Us vs. Them is a arcade shoot'em-up with flight theme.

211593.name: Once Upon a Time: Fairy Tales
211593.description:
Description from the publisher:

Pixies, goblins, and leprechauns live under toadstools and behind waterfalls in fairy tales, making mischief, delighting children, and spreading dewdrops across spiderwebs.

Fairy Tales is an expansion for Once Upon a Time, the card game in which players tell a story together using cards that show fairy tale elements and endings. Shuffle these elfin cards into your Once Upon a Time collection to sprinkle some magic fairy dust on your storytelling fun!

211594.name: Initial D: Arcade Stage
211594.description: User Summary: Initial D: Arcade Stage is a arcade racing game with manga theme. It is the first game in the Initial D series.

211596.name: Secrets of Magic: The Book of Spells
211596.description:
Dive into a magical world of witches and wizards. Travel through magical lands, relaxing music and help Victoria collect unique items along her journey to become a witch.

Source: The Developer Website.

211597.name: Robot Squad Simulator 2017
211597.description:
User Summary

Become an elite pilot of special Robot Squad. Use specialized, remotely controlled robots, which you will control yourself.

211599.name: Fuchs-Alarm!
211599.description:
The fox is trying to steal all chickens. Roll the dice and put the amount of chickens into the fox's pockets. If the pockets are full, he'll drop his pants and then you have to catch all the freed chickens with one hand.

The player who first fills their chicken coop wins.

This is a kid's dexterity game. There is a springload mechanism inside the fox plastic puppet that gets loaded bit by bit after pressing the fox's head which you have to do after putting the chickens into his pocket. After a random time this mechanism kicks in and retracts the pants.

211600.name: Ghost House
211600.description:
From publisher blurb:

The haunted mansion awaits characters who are courageous enough to brave its gloomy depths.

The thing about unquiet spirits is that they’re rarely very quiet. This is annoyingly clear to a Resurrectionist who lives next door to a haunted mansion that is filled with loud, noisy ghosts that seem determined to keep him up at night. Surely the Fated can put them to rest and help him get a good night’s sleep?

Ghost House is a location-based One Shot adventure for the Through the Breach roleplaying game. It requires the Fated Almanac to play.

211601.name: Skycurser
211601.description: User Summary: Skycurser is a shoot'em-up arcade by Blast, released in 2016. The game is developed specifically for JAMMA arcade hardware.

211603.name: Guts, Gods, and Glory - In That Order
211603.description:
From the introduction:

This quest takes the player characters through a harrowing journey of dangerous adversity! The characters are informed that some unknown adversary has disrupted an ancient tree called Wise Willow. This sends them first on a subterranean excursion into ancient tunnels infested with curiously ravenous Thri-Kreen! Then, they are introduced more formally with Wise Willow, who requires their services to cure her terrible plague! The players must then navigate the wild maze of her surface roots, purge it of grotesque creatures, and then find the cause of her ailment. Doing so excites the interest of the deities, Lathander and Sylvanus, who descend from the heavens in a glorious show of light and mysticism! The two divine beings then graciously bestow their gifts upon the party to reward their deeds.

User summary:

For 6th - 8th level characters.

211604.name: STaRS: The Simple Tabletop Roleplaying System
rpg: STaRS: The Simple Tabletop Roleplaying System
211604.description:
From the introduction:

More than anything else, STaRS strives for simplicity. If you can't be playing within thirty minutes of finishing this book, we've done something wrong. The rules are simple as we could make them, so that you can play without constantly referencing these rules. They're written to enable rather than constrain you, so you can spend more time having fun and less time flipping through rule books.

The game is easy on Directors as well as players. Creating non-player characters is a breeze — no need to spend hours crunching numbers and looking up abilities to create an enemy who'll only appear once.

211605.name: Spirits of the Rice Paddy: Dino Rush Promo Cards
211605.description:
Two rain cards for Spirits of the Rice Paddy that were included in The Great Dinosaur Rush

Rules: Simply add them to the Rain Deck

211606.name: Firefly Fluxx: Saffron
211606.description: Firefly Fluxx: Saffron is a mini-expansion for Firefly Fluxx that consists of a Saffron Keeper card and three goals that require Saffron (and other Keepers) to win.

211607.name: Age of Cthulhu 9: The Lost Expedition
211607.description:
(publisher blurb)

Deep in the Gobi Desert, the investigators discover a strange artifact amidst primordial fossils. The alien device is a gateway to a conduit to travel throughout the cosmos, known as The Great White Space. The investigators are then propelled to an alien world ruled by the Elder Things, a strange alien race of macabre scientists. Desperate to find a way home, the investigators must survive a hostile and alien world filled with mutant dinosaurs and the Elder Thing’s amorphous and putrid slave-beasts, the shoggoths!

211608.name: Arrows from the Sun
rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211608.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Growfest in Dunn is one of the most pleasant events of the year. Hopes are up that at this year’s Feast of Edoira, Lady Saiuhanna of Letharien will bring an end to the ongoing conflict between the nobles, and the strange blight that has targeted crops throughout the barony. But as preparation for the festivities proceed, it turns out not everyone welcomes the peace.

Part 2 in the Blood of Aerdy cycle.

A module for [character levels] 4 - 10.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211609.name: Whispers in the Dark
211609.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

It’s only a few more days to go before Wiccrhys and all of Pitchfield is in preparation for this feast. Hurrying back to be there on time, you must travel those last few miles from Axebjerg to Pitchfield: a journey that will take you past and sometimes through the Silent Valley. But on this journey back, it doesn’t take you long to notice that the Silent Valley isn’t so silent anymore. Can you find out what’s happening?

A scenario for [character levels] 2 - 12.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211610.name: Woodland Games
211610.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk With Optional Extension Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

An investigation into the logging affairs of the Pitchfield Merchant Guild ends in a wild celebration at the logger's camp. All is fine, why worry? Come! Join the fair! Drink, dance with satyrs and pixies! Grigs play the fiddle and you can join the pixie games!

An adventure for [character levels] 2 to 8.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211611.name: By a Moonlight Shadow
211611.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

It is late, the night is warm and a full Luna lights the deserted streets of the Olve District in Pitchfield. Only the adventurous are up and about. All is quiet and well – or is it? A woman’s scream is followed by an unnerving hound’s howl. Will you be in time to save her life?

A scenario for [character levels] 4 to 12.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211612.name: In Sickness and in Health
211612.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A lady in need of brave [characters], an army in need of supplies, a village in distress, an enemy in trouble. And all that in a days’ work. Such is the life of an adventurer.

An adventure for [character levels] 4 to 12.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211613.name: Bren's Men
211613.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Dark clouds are gathering over Sunndi – the country is at the brink of war, and it needs heroes! Yet not all the valorous are knights in shiny armor. Not all the glory comes of noble birth. Some of the greatest heroes are born in mud and the squalor of the slums. These are the men and women of Bren.

A regional scenario for [character levels] 2 to 12.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211614.name: Saving Dolkann
211614.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

War is upon Sunndi and with it follows pain, death and sorrow. A mother loses her husband and all her children, except one, and he is still fighting in the dismal swamp far from home. She begged her son’s superiors for aid and somehow she managed to convince them to give him a safer assignment. There is one problem: right now he is in the heat of the conflict. Getting him out is difficult and irresponsible. Perhaps a group of adventurers can help?

A scenario for [character levels] 2 to 12.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211615.name: The Lizard King
211615.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Vast Swamp: one of the most inhospitable places of Sunndi and still one of the richest in life – constantly spewing forth monsters of all kinds to threaten the peaceful citizens of Sunndi. Not all stinks in the Vast Swamp though, but what to do if the rot spreads and allies become enemies?

An adventure for [characters level] 4 to 10.

First part of the Crest of Glory series.

It is recommended that participants have played SND3-02: Murky Waters.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211616.name: Cold Fury
211616.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

To help one lost olve, another must be found. Secluded in mountain meadows, a special messenger is needed since only the experienced dare to tread among the evergreens of the Glorioles – especially in winter.

An adventure for [character levels] 4 to 12.

Sequel to SND4-04: By a Moonlight Shadow with ties to SND4-02: Whispers in the Dark.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211617.name: A Few Bad Men
211617.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Regional Adventure set in the Kingdom of Sunndi

From the introduction:

The blood! The violence! The shouting! And that’s just chow-time. Military training will create bonds that last a lifetime, or so some say. It’s just a little hard to imagine while you are neck deep in mud, trying to hang on to your buddy while an ape with two stripes yells in your ear to hustle. And you volunteered for this? Just to find a few bad men?

An adventure for [character levels] 2 to 6, but especially well suited for beginning characters interested in a military or espionage career.

Characters with a high-risk disfavor with the Iron League or Jade Mask cannot play this scenario.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211618.name: Isle in the Wake
211618.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

War washes out of the Vast Swamp and a tide of refugees is pushed north. One community tries to hold its own in the wake of the war, but heroes are needed to save it.

A one-round scenario for [character levels] 2 to 12 for those prepared for war.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211619.name: Lesser Evils
211619.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A child wanders into Pitchfield - alone and abandoned with nothing but the rags she wears and the scorched doll she hugs like her life depends on it. Unwilling or unable to talk, she cannot answer any questions. Who is she? Where is she from? What horrors did she witness? Can the heroes resist the lure of a mystery or the cries for help from a child?

A one-round adventure for [character levels] 2 - 8.

Part one of the "Hero's Love Song" series.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211620.name: Behind Enemy Lines
211620.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A great commander once said that it is the duty of a commander to feed off the enemy. It is wise advice, but easier said than done, especially when it takes you far behind enemy lines.

A tactical one-round Sunndi Regional adventure set in Corul for characters level 2 - 12.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211621.name: Collateral
211621.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A monster prowls the Vast Swamp, threatening the community of Eyedrinn and frustrating their promises of much needed support in the war. Since they seem unable to deal with it, it is up to you to help the Hextorites with their problem... whether they like it or not.

A one-round Sunndi regional adventure for characters level 3 - 11.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211622.name: Acceptance
211622.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A special performance by Whice Ium sends you on a dangerous journey back to Qual. It is time to face the fiend and for the children of Londa to face their past. A one round Sunndi regional adventure for characters level 2 - 13.

Part 3 and conclusion of the Hero's Love Song series.

This adventure contains spoilers for SND6-01 Lesser Evil and SND7-06 Disillusion, which should be played first. It is highly recommended that at least one charismatic character be included in the party.

User summary:

Although this scenario was prepared for play season 7, it was apparently used during early play season 8.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211623.name: As Time Goes By
211623.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Someone – or something – is disturbing old graves of almost-forgotten villagers. Who meddles with the dead, and why? Is there a reason the trail leads towards the Vast Swamp?

A one-round regional set in southern Sunndi and the Vast Swamp for character levels 5 - 13.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211624.name: Obvious Suspect
211624.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

As in every war, food is in short supply for the common men and when hunger threatens, trouble is afoot. So what to do when strange sounds are heard coming from a warehouse with its guards missing?

Sequel of SND6-02M Angel’s Share.

A one-round Sunndi regional adventure set in the town of Pitchfield for characters level 1 - 12.

211625.name: The Sea Devils
rpgseries: DUL - Living Greyhawk Dullstrand Regional Adventures
SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211625.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Dullstrand/Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Raids from the sea plague the coastal towns, when sahuagin seek control of the coastal waters. For the Masters of Dullstrand, a safe haven is of prime importance. To secure the seafaring trade, sacrifices have to be made. But are the devils of the deep really interested to talk?

A one-round regional adventure set in the Dullstrand for characters level 5 - 14.

Note: The Dullstrand and Sunndi version are exactly the same. Only one can be played.

211626.name: A New Threat
rpgseries: DUL - Living Greyhawk Dullstrand Regional Adventures
SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211626.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi/Dullstrand Cross-Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

With all Sunndi’s attention focused on the Wastrian war in the south, invaders from the north have exploited an opportunity.

A one-round Sunndi region adventure set in County of Ralsond and Hestmark Highlands for characters level 1-15.

Tied together with DUL7-01/SND7-03: The Sea Devils.

Note: The Dullstrand and Sunndi version are exactly the same. Only one can be played per player.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211627.name: A Few Less Men
211627.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Betrayed betrayers, fugitive fugitives, conflicts about fear, fears of conflict. Its a crazy world and as always truth is a scarce commodity. Can it be found? Can you handle the truth? Time for a few more headaches and all because of a few less men.

An investigative adventure for [character] level 1 to 10, especially suited for members of the Darkwater Skirmishers; Characters with the High Risk disfavor from the Iron League or Jade Mask cannot play this scenario.

User summary:

This scenario was distributed as a 35-page PDF and accompanied by a 1-page PDF player handout.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211628.name: Disillusion
211628.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Answers must be dug up from the past as you once again aid the followers of Myrhiss. Along the way you will meet people touched by the world. For some people, it is so easy to get lost in the suffering and wrap themselves in the comfort of pain and sorrow with little room for anyone else. Others come through stronger, but scarred. Who is strong and who is lost? You will need to decide who to trust.

A one round Sunndi regional adventure for characters level 1 - 10.

Part 2 of the Hero's Love Song series.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211629.name: Dig Deeper
211629.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

There's trouble at the mines, and it's not just one of the crossbeams gone out askew on the treadle. The Dwarven silver miners at the edge of the Rieuwood may never have been appreciated by the neighboring elves, and there have always been minor troubles, but now there have been disappearances as well. Can you discover what has happened, and appease both neighbors before things get out of hand?

A one-round Sunndi Regional scenario for character levels 3 - 13.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211630.name: Unexpected Enemies: Caravan Duty
211630.description:
Part of a Two-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

With the lines of war drawn clearly across Sunndian soil things seem black and white. Good or bad, friend or foe, easy distinctions to make in such threatening times. Help is on its way from an expected source, but what if some fail to see it thus? Will adventurers once more shine their light into the darkness and clean away the sorrow?

A 2-round regional special set in the Kingdom of Sunndi - part battle interactive, part mini-adventure, for levels 1 to 10.

Part of the Bullywug War series.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211631.name: Unexpected Enemies: Chasing Enemies
211631.description:
Part of a Two-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

With the lines of war drawn clearly across Sunndian soil things seem black and white. Good or bad, friend or foe, easy distinctions to make in such threatening times. Help is on its way from an expected source, but what if some fail to see it thus? Will adventurers once more shine their light into the darkness and clean away the sorrow?

A 2-round regional special set in the Kingdom of Sunndi - part battle interactive, part mini-adventure, for levels 1 to 10.

Part of the Bullywug War series.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211632.name: Unexpected Enemies: Into Darkness
211632.description:
Part of a Two-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

With the lines of war drawn clearly across Sunndian soil things seem black and white. Good or bad, friend or foe, easy distinctions to make in such threatening times. Help is on its way from an expected source, but what if some fail to see it thus? Will adventurers once more shine their light into the darkness and clean away the sorrow?

A 2-round regional special set in the Kingdom of Sunndi - part battle interactive, part mini-adventure, for levels 1 to 10.

Part of the Bullywug War series.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211633.name: Unexpected Enemies: Missing Scouts
211633.description:
Part of a Two-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

With the lines of war drawn clearly across Sunndian soil things seem black and white. Good or bad, friend or foe, easy distinctions to make in such threatening times. Help is on its way from an expected source, but what if some fail to see it thus? Will adventurers once more shine their light into the darkness and clean away the sorrow?

A 2-round regional special set in the Kingdom of Sunndi - part battle interactive, part mini-adventure, for levels 1 to 10.

Part of the Bullywug War series.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211634.name: Save Our Souls Round 1
211634.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

The war of steel is done, but the war of minds is not yet won. Many souls are in peril, kept away from our truth, to be subject to the lies of the hopping prophet. This must end. This can end. With your help, our values shall prevail.

A two-round Sunndi regional special set in the Vast Swamp for characters level 2 - 15.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211635.name: Save Our Souls Round 2
211635.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

The war of steel is done, but the war of minds is not yet won. Many souls are in peril, kept away from our truth, to be subject to the lies of the hopping prophet. This must end. This can end. With your help, our values shall prevail.

A two-round Sunndi regional special set in the Vast Swamp for characters level 2 - 15.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
211636.name: Crocodile Tears
211636.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The war is over, the country lies in ruins and the first refugees have returned home finding nothing but the burned down remains of their former villages. King Kestor has put out a call for adventurers and war heroes to assist the refugees and to reinstate the proper law and King’s rule.

This scenario is of great interest to Squires, Bachelor Knights and for those who proved their worth during the war, there will be a special reward for them.

A one-round Regional adventure set in Sunndi for characters level 2 - 15.

211637.description:
This pawn set is intended to upgrade the wooden pieces of the first edition to the ones from the second edition.
It contains 16 pawns (4 in each color) with the symbols already on them (first edition: stickers), one white wooden snowflake, and one white wooden polar bear.
211637.name: Race to the North Pole: Second Edition Pawn Set

211638.name: Colony FLGS Promo
211638.description:
Promo card (set of 4 cards) distributed in Essen 2016.

Cost: six sixes.
Value: 3 VPs, 4 VPs when upgraded. No special text.

211641.name: The Horus Heresy: Burning of Prospero
211641.description:
Description from the publisher:

The Horus Heresy: Burning of Prospero is a game of running battles set in a city torn apart by a fiery cataclysm, featuring six scenarios designed to stretch the strategic nous of two players. One player controls the Space Marines of the Thousand Sons, reality-twisting psychic superhumans, and one controls the Space Wolves, Sisters of Silence and Custodian Guard. It’s a fast-paced game full of strategic decisions, with the strengths and weaknesses of both sides meaning tactics and foresight are just as important as lucky dice rolls.

211642.name: Future Wars - (Issue 22)
rpgissuearticle: New Vehicles: The Gauss & LRM Howitzer
The Americal Division Takes of Poeria
211642.description:
From the Cover:
Vehicles and MUCH MORE!

211645.description:
A mini-expansion for Great Scott! - The Game of Mad Invention, Commissions adds 24 new cards and a new way to score.

Instead of building inventions willy-nilly, with Commissions you have targets to aim for. Match the cards in your invention with the icons shown on a Commission card to claim its bonus points – as long as your invention does what the commissioner wants it to do…

The Commissions expansion is included as an exclusively free extra in Kickstarter editions of Great Scott!, but is also available separately.
211645.name: Great Scott!: Commissions

211646.name: Negligee
211646.description:
A story of love and lingerie as you are thrust into the role as manager of the shop 'Negligee' alongside three beautiful women.

Source: The Developer Website.

211647.name: Violet Haunted
211647.description:
Classic JRPG style action with turn based combat. Figure out how to stop an army of darkness despite wielding dark powers yourself. Use the enemies' abilities against them to gain the upper hand.

Source: The Developer Website.

211650.name: Full Throttle
211650.description: The core rulebook for the pen-and-paper adaptation of LucasArts' biker-themed adventure game by the same title.

211651.name: The Blizzard's Teeth
211651.description:
(publisher blurb)

Strangers eye each other across the frosty courtyard of the keep. Outside the blizzard howls - but is it the wind, or the shapes within that have already slaughtered your companions?

This is a Jaws of the Six Serpents adventure of fantasy survival horror by Scott Dorward, designed for convention or one-shot use. The characters provided are a dubious lot with secrets and agendas that will drive events. Will they work together in the face of a terrifying enemy?

211652.description:
In Ports of Call, each player becomes a starship captain of an interstellar freighter with the goal of building a trading empire among the planets of the Imperium.

Ports of Call includes multiple ways of playing. By buying low and selling high, players gain more income and can buy more ships. Also, players can choose to fight pirates or even collect bounties, but if you attack civilian vessels, you may find that bounty hunters are looking for you!

Features:

Six factions: the Imperium, System Defense Force, Bounty Hunters, *Pirate Clans, Celadon Pirates, & Magna Raiderrs
Over 100+ full-color ship counters + additional markers
22 Stat Cards (one for each ship class)
Full-color game map (26"x27", divided into 12 sections)
211652.name: Imperium Chronicles: Ports of Call

211653.description:
Dice Rockets is a fun dexterity game, in which players are
flicking dice on a surface in order to get the best spots on a
field of holes that score points.
Each player has its own set of five colored dice and players are
taking turns flicking dice from the launch space and trying to
land their dice rockets on the most rewarding spaces.
If a die lands on the same space as another player's, then the
player with the higher result gets the reward. In case of a tie,
nobody gets a reward.
After all dice are launched, players calculate the points
scored, take their dice sets back and start launching again.
If a player wins two out of three rounds, he or she is declared
the best dice launcher!
211653.name: Dice Rockets

211654.name: Die Bilder des Isidor Necpla
211654.description:
Eine mysteriöse Krankheit oder doch der Fluch der alten Pharaonen?
Auf der Suche nach der Antwort müssen sich die Charaktere ihren Weg durch ganz Lyonesse bahnen.
